We have a great passion for creating media and put love into every pixel.</p>\r\n\r\n<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-83" alt="Break" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Break1-300x2.png" style="width:100%; height:2px;"/>\r\n\r\n<div style="width: 100%;">\r\n<div align="center">\r\n<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-71" alt="ManannCharacature" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/ManannCharacature.png"/>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n\r\n<h1>Manann Him</h1>\r\n\r\n<p>Hi I’m Manann Him. I am an enthusiastic, motivated and energetic individual with love and passion for creating media. I started learning HTML on my own when social media started to become popular. Back then I enjoyed customizing profile pages on various social networking websites. After developing these skills for 4 years I decided to expand my knowledge and go to college to pursue a career in media. I have experience with video editing, website development and logo design. I can code a website from scratch and customise WordPress templates.</p>\r\n\r\n<p>Going to college to study Multi-Media Design and Production was one of the best decisions I made in my personal life. I have taken my passion for media and made it my career. I’ve been designing and creating clean, elegant, creative websites for two years and on the side I like to work on video effects and poster design projects.</p>\r\n\r\n<p style="color:#277e9c;"><a href="http://www.imaginebigdesign.ca" target="_blank" style="color:#277e9c;">My portfolio website</a></p>\r\n<p style="color:#277e9c;">manannh5@gmail.com</p>\r\n\r\n<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-83" alt="Break" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Break1-300x2.png" style="width:100%; height:2px;"/>\r\n\r\n<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-70" alt="CoreyCharacature" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/CoreyCharacature.png"/>\r\n\r\n<h1>Corey Noble</h1>\r\n\r\n<p>Hi I\'m Corey Noble. I took every possible art and programming course in high-school and promptly went to college to learn about website and media development. I also took a 3D animation program. Upon graduating my final year I was an IOS and Android game developer. Since then I have been working as a freelance website developer and enhancing my 3D skills through personal works and online competitions.</p>\r\n\r\n<p>Although I have finished my education, I am never done learning and enhancing my technical and artistic talents. INSERT INTO `wp_posts` VALUES (365, 2, '2014-03-16 19:12:08', '2014-03-16 19:12:08', '<p>We are freelance web developers from London Ontario. Both graduates of the Multi-Media Design and Production program, as well as the 3D Animation and Character Design program at Fanshawe College. We have a great passion for creating media and put love into every pixel.</p>\r\n\r\n<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-83" alt="Break" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Break1-300x2.png" style="width:100%; height:2px;"/>\r\n\r\n<h1 style="text-align:center;">Manann Him</h1>\r\n\r\n<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-71" alt="ManannCharacature" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/ManannCharacature.png"/>\r\n\r\n<p>Hi I’m Manann Him. I am an enthusiastic, motivated and energetic individual with love and passion for creating media. I started learning HTML on my own when social media started to become popular. Back then I enjoyed customizing profile pages on various social networking websites. After developing these skills for 4 years I decided to expand my knowledge and go to college to pursue a career in media. I have experience with video editing, website development and logo design. I can code a website from scratch and customise WordPress templates.</p>\r\n\r\n<p>Going to college to study Multi-Media Design and Production was one of the best decisions I made in my personal life. I’ve been designing and creating clean, elegant, creative websites for two years and on the side I like to work on video effects and poster design projects.</p>\r\n\r\n<p style="color:#277e9c;"><a href="http://www.imaginebigdesign.ca" target="_blank" style="color:#277e9c;">My portfolio website</a></p>\r\n<p style="color:#277e9c;">manannh5@gmail.com</p>\r\n\r\n<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-83" alt="Break" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Break1-300x2.png" style="width:100%; height:2px;"/>\r\n\r\n<h1 style="text-align:center;">Corey Noble</h1>\r\n\r\n<div style="width: 100%;">\r\n<div align="center">\r\n<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-70" alt="CoreyCharacature" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/CoreyCharacature.png"/>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n\r\n<p>Hi I\'m Corey Noble. While many people don\'t know what they want to do as a career for the rest of their lives, I was lucky in knowing that I wanted to pursue the arts at a fairly young age. I took every possible art and programming course in high-school and promptly went to college to learn about website and media development. I also took a 3D animation program. Upon graduating my final year I was an IOS and Android game developer. Since then I have been working as a freelance website developer and enhancing my 3D skills through personal works and online competitions.</p>\r\n\r\n<p>Although I have finished my education, I am never done learning and enhancing my technical and artistic talents. I am an enthusiastic, motivated and energetic individual with love and passion for creating media. I started learning HTML on my own when social media started to become popular. Back then I enjoyed customizing profile pages on various social networking websites. After developing these skills for 4 years I decided to expand my knowledge and go to college to pursue a career in media. I have experience with video editing, website development and logo design. I can code a website from scratch and customise WordPress templates.</p>\r\n\r\n<p>Going to college to study Multi-Media Design and Production was one of the best decisions I made in my personal life. I have taken my passion for media and made it my career. I’ve been designing and creating clean, elegant, creative websites for two years and on the side I like to work on video effects and poster design projects.</p>\r\n\r\n<p style="color:#277e9c;"><a href="http://www.imaginebigdesign.ca" target="_blank" style="color:#277e9c;">My portfolio website</a></p>\r\n<p style="color:#277e9c;">manannh5@gmail.com</p>\r\n\r\n<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-83" alt="Break" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Break1-300x2.png" style="width:100%; height:2px;"/>\r\n\r\n<div style="width: 100%;">\r\n<h1 style="text-align: left;">Corey Noble</h1>\r\n\r\n<img alt="CoreyCharacature" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/CoreyCharacature.png" style="float: left;"/>\r\n\r\n<p style="float: left; width: 75%; margin-left: 5px;">Hi I\'m Corey Noble. While many people don\'t know what they want to do as a career for the rest of their lives, I was lucky in knowing that I wanted to pursue the arts at a fairly young age. I took every possible art and programming course in high-school and promptly went to college to learn about website and media development. I also took a 3D animation program. Upon graduating my final year I was an IOS and Android game developer. Since then I have been working as a freelance website developer and enhancing my 3D skills through personal works and online competitions.</p>\r\n\r\n<p style="float: left;">Although I have finished my education, I am never done learning and enhancing my technical and artistic talents. I can code a website from scratch and customise WordPress templates.</p>\r\n\r\n<p>Going to college to study Multi-Media Design and Production was one of the best decisions I made in my personal life. I am an enthusiastic, motivated and energetic individual with love and passion for creating media. I started learning HTML on my own when social media started to become popular. Back then I enjoyed customizing profile pages on various social networking websites. After developing these skills for 4 years I decided to expand my knowledge and go to college to pursue a career in media. I have experience with video editing, website development and logo design. I can code a website from scratch and customise WordPress templates.</p>\r\n\r\n<p>Going to college to study Multi-Media Design and Production was one of the best decisions I made in my personal life. I have taken my passion for media and made it my career. I’ve been designing and creating clean, elegant, creative websites for two years and on the side I like to work on video effects and poster design projects.</p>\r\n\r\n<p style="color:#277e9c;"><a href="http://www.imaginebigdesign.ca" target="_blank" style="color:#277e9c;">My portfolio website</a></p>\r\n<p style="color:#277e9c;">manannh5@gmail.com</p>\r\n\r\n<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-83" alt="Break" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Break1-300x2.png" style="width:100%; height:2px;"/>\r\n\r\n<div style="width: 100%;">\r\n<h1 style="text-align: left; font-size: 35px; text-align: center;">Corey Noble</h1>\r\n\r\n<img alt="CoreyCharacature" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/CoreyCharacature.png" style="float: left; width: 25%;"/>\r\n\r\n<p style="float: left; width: 70%; margin-left: 10px; font-size: 17px;">Hi I\'m Corey Noble. While many people don\'t know what they want to do as a career for the rest of their lives, I was lucky in knowing that I wanted to pursue the arts at a fairly young age. I took every possible art and programming course in high-school and promptly went to college to learn about website and media development. I also took a 3D animation program. Upon graduating my final year I was an IOS and Android game developer. Since then I have been working as a freelance website developer and enhancing my 3D skills through personal works and online competitions.</p>\r\n\r\n<p style="float: left; width: 70%; margin-left: 10px; font-size: 17px;">Although I have finished my education, I am never done learning and enhancing my technical and artistic talents. Upon graduating my final year I was an IOS and Android game developer. Upon graduating my final year I was an IOS and Android game developer. Back then I enjoyed customizing profile pages on various social networking websites. Back then I enjoyed customizing profile pages on various social networking websites. After developing these skills for 4 years I decided to expand my knowledge and go to college to pursue a career in media. I have experience with video editing, website development and logo design. I can code a website from scratch and customise WordPress templates.</p>\r\n\r\n<p style="float: left; width: 95%; margin-left: 10px; font-size: 17px;">Going to college to study Multi-Media Design and Production was one of the best decisions I made in my personal life. INSERT INTO `wp_posts` VALUES (436, 2, '2014-03-16 20:30:40', '2014-03-16 20:30:40', '<p style="font-size: 17px; width: 95%; margin-left: 10px;">We are freelance web developers from London Ontario. Both graduates of the Multi-Media Design and Production program, as well as the 3D Animation and Character Design program at Fanshawe College. We have a great passion for creating media and put love into every pixel.</p>\r\n\r\n<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-83" alt="Break" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Break1-300x2.png" style="width:100%; height:2px; margin: 0; padding: 0;"/>\r\n<h1 style="text-align: left; font-size: 35px; text-align: center; margin: 0; padding: 0;">Manann Him</h1>\r\n<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-83" alt="Break" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Break1-300x2.png" style="width:100%; height:2px; margin: 0; padding: 0; margin-top: 3px;"/>\r\n\r\n<img alt="ManannCharacature" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/ManannCharacature.png" style="float: left; width: 25%; margin-left: 10px;"/>\r\n\r\n<p style="float: left; width: 68%; margin-left: 10px; font-size: 17px;">Hi I’m Manann Him. I am an enthusiastic, motivated and energetic individual with love and passion for creating media. I started learning HTML on my own when social media started to become popular. Back then I enjoyed customizing profile pages on various social networking websites. After developing these skills for 4 years I decided to expand my knowledge and go to college to pursue a career in media. I have experience with video editing, website development and logo design. I can code a website from scratch and customise WordPress templates.</p>\r\n\r\n<p style="float: left; width: 95%; margin-left: 10px; font-size: 17px;">Going to college to study Multi-Media Design and Production was one of the best decisions I made in my personal life. I have taken my passion for media and made it my career. I’ve been designing and creating clean, elegant, creative websites for two years and on the side I like to work on video effects and poster design projects.</p>\r\n</div>\r\n\r\n<div style="float: left; width: 100%;">\r\n<p style="color:#277e9c; font-size: 20px; margin: 0; padding: 0; margin-top: 3px; margin-left: 10px;"><a href="http://www.imaginebigdesign.ca" target="_blank" style="color:#277e9c;">My portfolio website</a></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div style="float: left; width: 100%;">\r\n<p style="color:#277e9c; font-size: 20px;  margin: 0; padding: 0; margin-top: 3px; margin-left: 10px;">manannh5@gmail.com</p>\r\n</div>\r\n\r\n<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-83" alt="Break" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Break1-300x2.png" style="width:100%; height:2px;"/>\r\n\r\n<div style="width: 100%;">\r\n<h1 style="text-align: left; font-size: 35px; text-align: center;">Corey Noble</h1>\r\n<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-83" alt="Break" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Break1-300x2.png" style="width:100%; height:2px;"/>\r\n\r\n<img alt="CoreyCharacature" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/CoreyCharacature.png" style="float: left; width: 25%; margin-left: 10px;"/>\r\n\r\n<p style="float: left; width: 68%; margin-left: 10px; font-size: 17px;">Hi I\'m Corey Noble. While many people don\'t know what they want to do as a career for the rest of their lives, I was lucky in knowing that I wanted to pursue the arts at a fairly young age. I took every possible art and programming course in high-school and promptly went to college to learn about website and media development. I also took a 3D animation program. Upon graduating my final year I was an IOS and Android game developer. Since then I have been working as a freelance website developer and enhancing my 3D skills through personal works and online competitions.</p>\r\n\r\n<p style="float: left; width: 95%; margin-left: 10px; font-size: 17px;">Although I have finished my education, I am never done learning and enhancing my technical and artistic talents. I can code a website from scratch and customise WordPress templates.</p>\r\n\r\n<p style="float: left; width: 95%; margin-left: 10px; font-size: 17px;">Going to college to study Multi-Media Design and Production was one of the best decisions I made in my personal life. I’ve been designing and creating clean, elegant, creative websites for two years and on the side I like to work on video effects and poster design projects.</p>\r\n</div>\r\n\r\n<div style="float: left; width: 100%;">\r\n<p style="color:#277e9c; font-size: 20px; margin: 0; padding: 0; margin-top: 3px; margin-left: 10px;"><a href="http://www.imaginebigdesign.ca" target="_blank" style="color:#277e9c;">My portfolio website</a></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div style="float: left; width: 100%;">\r\n<p style="color:#277e9c; font-size: 20px; margin: 0; padding: 0; margin-top: 3px; margin-left: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px;">manannh5@gmail.com</p>\r\n</div>\r\n\r\n<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-83" alt="Break" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Break1-300x2.png" style="width:100%; height:2px; margin: 0; padding: 0;"/>\r\n<div style="width: 100%;">\r\n<h1 style="text-align: left; font-size: 35px; text-align: center; margin: 0; padding: 0;">Corey Noble</h1>\r\n\r\n<img alt="CoreyCharacature" src="http://0391e66.netsolhost.com/RightChoice/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/CoreyCharacature.png" style="float: left; width: 25%; margin-left: 10px;"/>\r\n\r\n<p style="float: left; width: 68%; margin-left: 10px; font-size: 17px;">Hi I\'m Corey Noble. # --------------------------------------------------------

# --------------------------------------------------------
# Table: `wp_term_relationships`
# --------------------------------------------------------


#
# Delete any existing table `wp_term_relationships`
#

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `wp_term_relationships`;


#
# Table structure of table `wp_term_relationships`
#

CREATE TABLE `wp_term_relationships` (
  `object_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL default '0',
  `term_taxonomy_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL default '0',
  `term_order` int(11) NOT NULL default '0',
  PRIMARY KEY  (`object_id`,`term_taxonomy_id`),
  KEY `term_taxonomy_id` (`term_taxonomy_id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ;

#
# Data contents of table `wp_term_relationships`
#
 
INSERT INTO `wp_term_relationships` VALUES (196, 2, 0); 
INSERT INTO `wp_term_relationships` VALUES (197, 2, 0); 
INSERT INTO `wp_term_relationships` VALUES (199, 2, 0); 
INSERT INTO `wp_term_relationships` VALUES (200, 2, 0);
#
# End of data contents of table `wp_term_relationships`
# --------------------------------------------------------

# --------------------------------------------------------
# Table: `wp_term_taxonomy`
# --------------------------------------------------------


#
# Delete any existing table `wp_term_taxonomy`
#

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `wp_term_taxonomy`;


#
# Table structure of table `wp_term_taxonomy`
#

CREATE TABLE `wp_term_taxonomy` (
  `term_taxonomy_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
  `term_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL default '0',
  `taxonomy` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '',
  `description` longtext NOT NULL,
  `parent` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL default '0',
  `count` bigint(20) NOT NULL default '0',
  PRIMARY KEY  (`term_taxonomy_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `term_id_taxonomy` (`term_id`,`taxonomy`),
  KEY `taxonomy` (`taxonomy`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ;

#
# Data contents of table `wp_term_taxonomy`
#
 
INSERT INTO `wp_term_taxonomy` VALUES (1, 1, 'category', '', 0, 0); 
INSERT INTO `wp_term_taxonomy` VALUES (2, 2, 'nav_menu', '', 0, 4);
#
# End of data contents of table `wp_term_taxonomy`
# --------------------------------------------------------

# --------------------------------------------------------
# Table: `wp_terms`
# --------------------------------------------------------


#
# Delete any existing table `wp_terms`
#

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `wp_terms`;


#
# Table structure of table `wp_terms`
#

CREATE TABLE `wp_terms` (
  `term_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
  `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL default '',
  `slug` varchar(200) NOT NULL default '',
  `term_group` bigint(10) NOT NULL default '0',
  PRIMARY KEY  (`term_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `slug` (`slug`),
  KEY `name` (`name`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ;

#
# Data contents of table `wp_terms`
#
 
INSERT INTO `wp_terms` VALUES (1, 'Uncategorized', 'uncategorized', 0); 
INSERT INTO `wp_terms` VALUES (2, 'Menu 1', 'menu-1', 0);
#
# End of data contents of table `wp_terms`
# --------------------------------------------------------

# --------------------------------------------------------
# Table: `wp_usermeta`
# --------------------------------------------------------


#
# Delete any existing table `wp_usermeta`
#

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `wp_usermeta`;


#
# Table structure of table `wp_usermeta`
#

CREATE TABLE `wp_usermeta` (
  `umeta_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL default '0',
  `meta_key` varchar(255) default NULL,
  `meta_value` longtext,
  PRIMARY KEY  (`umeta_id`),
  KEY `user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `meta_key` (`meta_key`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=49 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ;

# Data contents of table `wp_usermeta`
#

# --------------------------------------------------------
# Table: `wp_users`
# --------------------------------------------------------


#
# Delete any existing table `wp_users`
#

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `wp_users`;


#
# Table structure of table `wp_users`
#

CREATE TABLE `wp_users` (
  `ID` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
  `user_login` varchar(60) NOT NULL default '',
  `user_pass` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '',
  `user_nicename` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '',
  `user_email` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '',
  `user_url` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '',
  `user_registered` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00',
  `user_activation_key` varchar(60) NOT NULL default '',
  `user_status` int(11) NOT NULL default '0',
  `display_name` varchar(250) NOT NULL default '',
  PRIMARY KEY  (`ID`),
  KEY `user_login_key` (`user_login`),
  KEY `user_nicename` (`user_nicename`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ;
